features: We Called It Second Skin For A Reason! We can all agree, wearing a mask in these unsettling times is the ultimate in unconditional love for humankind. But suffering for it under a scratchy cloth mask is bitter sweet. So we created a pack of 4 contoured masks for protection, with a buttery-soft hug.

Fresher Face Masks: Single layer fabric mask that’s surprisingly easy to get fresh air! In fact, you’ll struggle to find a customer who says they’re not. Our fabric, combined with intentional seam placement and 3D contour allows the covering to hug the nose and chin, without sticking to your mouth.

Easy Wear For Long Periods: Instead of removing your mask, or suffering with chafing, itching and pain - our masks and ear-loops are 92.5% polyester and 7.5% spandex. It’s this fabric blend that creates a buttery-soft silk feel that’s kinder on your skin and your ears and more comfy as a workout mask.

Reusable Face Masks Washable. This is our new daily ritual, so it’s out with the landfill-clogging disposable face masks, and in with a cloth mask that lasts the distance and looks cute. And while we won’t tell you how to do laundry, a designer face mask like this is best washed with care.

Loved Across The World: From USA to Europe, Second Skin are the masks you choose most! Read all our nice comments to find out why, and order yours now. Your 4 Mask Pack includes a Black, Blue, Gray and Pink Face Mask (13.5” ear to ear / 5.5” top to bottom). Embrace The Ritual with VIRTUE CODE.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It’s Called Second Skin For A Reason. It’s the ultimate in unconditional love right now, wearing a mask for the safety of others while protecting ourselves. But those scratchy, stuffy masks make the sacrifice bitter sweet. So we created a special “second skin” pack of 4 face masks, so instead of discomfort, your face enjoys a buttery-soft hug, instead.

Self-Care Is Many Things, But Here… It’s Fabric Selection and Design 4 Colors Per Pack The Second Skin Mask Pack includes different shades of Blue Masks so you can match your mask to your outfit! Measuring 13.5” ear to ear and 5.5” top to bottom they’re suited for men and women – but of course, measure first to make sure your beautiful face also loves the size of its new Second Skin. The Fresher Face Mask! We’ve all had masks that make it hard to find fresh air, but not here! Our single layer fabric, intentional seam placement, and 3D contouring ensures the chin and nose are covered, but won’t stick to your mouth! Great for those who are concerned about feeling a little stifled beneath other masks. Comfortable For All-Day Wear Instead of the hassle of removing it, or suffering with chafing, itching and pain, our masks and ear-loops are made with 92.5% polyester and 7.5% spandex – and that creates the buttery soft feel that gives our masks the name of Second Skin! The 3-Way Stretch ensures a snug fit that feels like it was made just for you

Inspired by you, and incepted by two sisters in love with the rituals of manifesting a happy and healthy lifestyle - VIRTUE CODE creates products that unlock the Self-Care Codes to mind-body-spirit wellness

4 Reusable Masks With billions of people now using masks, clogging up landfill isn’t healthy or kind. But you, with your soft cloth masks are making a difference. Easy To Wash We won’t tell you how to do laundry, but face masks like this are best washed with care. With their poly-spandex blend, they’re easy to wash and dry fast! No-Pressure Fit Second Skin uses the same buttery-soft fabric as the mask for a no pressure fit that feels comfy. Minimal ‘Maskne’ Fresh, moisture wicking, and washable masks like this reduce the risk of maskne. And while it can’t always be avoided, Second Skin won’t flare it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does not irritate skin or ears. Breathable material. Going to buy again. I would Highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product description is absolutely accurate
reviews.reviewText: Delivery time was fairly long, but really worth it. It truly is a buttery soft. And fit really well and too big not too small perfect. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: All I can say is MAKE SURE TO WASH BEFORE USING!I washed mine in the sink beforehand, and was shocked to see how much dye and tiny fabric particulates was left in the water. You DO NOT want that stuff on your face or in your lungs. Not to mention these masks stink like chemicals right out of the box.Other than that, pretty decent masks. Soft, doesn't pull on the ears like some masks do. I would say these are medium-sized. They fit me perfect, but I could see them being slightly too large for petite faces, and too tight for those with strong chins or wide faces.All in all not bad. The dye and particulates are a little concerning, but nothing a wash doesn't solve. Just make sure to hand-wash, or put in a wash bag on delicate cycle. Either will help prolong the life of the masks. Also, made of polyester and spandex, these will not shrink in the dryer.4/5 stars for decent masks at the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are extremely lightweight and feel like you’re not wearing a mask. I wear glasses and have dealt over the past couple of years with my glasses fogging and that is not an issue with these. I’ll be traveling soon and I wanted to take precautions and these will be very comfortable for that purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice design, a bit too big
reviews.reviewText: I might've bought the wrong size, but as a small adult, I figured the adult size would be more suitable than a child's mask. I like the design, but I struggle with keeping the mask close to the bridge of my nose, which means it slips down pretty often. My nose, in case you need reference, is straight and slightly round at the tip, which means masks don't /usually/ slip down. For people with maybe wider and/or flatter noses (no judgment, but just in case your features are different than mine), these masks probably are not super suitable. If there was a metal pieces to hug the bridge of wearer's nose, maybe. There's no way to adjust this either because it's entirely cloth. It is nicely breathable and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They fit well, they don’t block my vision and the does not pull on the ears.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not very good . The product was very, very thin. Wish I had returned. Was going out of town the day of delivery. Do not buy. Go to the store and buy a pair of nylons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Finally tasteful minimal masks in discreet colours. Just wish they weren’t so big!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Very soft feels like you are not wearing one
reviews.reviewText: They are really comfortable to wear it feels like you are not wearing a face mask. I also like the fact that it fits completely over your nose and mouth and that you can breath easily through it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Far to big for my face
reviews.reviewText: Not a great fit to big and not all the same size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 19, 2022
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my 11 year old son who has to wear at school all day, they are so soft, easy to wear and breathable. I also use them as they don’t irritate the skin like others have.
